item.title: Calibre Change Notice
item.description: With the release of Calibre v6.0 the project now provides official binaries for arm64 and has dropped all support for 32-bit platforms. As a result our latest tag now supports amd64 and arm64 and we will be deprecating the arch tag in the near future. If you are currently using the arch tag on 64-bit arm please switch to latest. If you are using the arch tag on 32-bit arm you can pin to the arch-version-79d7ec5e tag but there will be no further updates provided.
item.content:
With the release of Calibre v6.0 the project now provides official binaries for arm64 and has dropped all support for 32-bit platforms.

As a result our latest tag now supports amd64 and arm64 and we will be deprecating the arch tag in the near future. If you are currently using the arch tag on 64-bit arm please switch to latest. If you are using the arch tag on 32-bit arm you can pin to the arch-version-79d7ec5e tag but there will be no further updates provided.

item.title: New Container: Calibre
item.description: We have released a new container for Calibre! Calibre is a powerful and easy to use e-book manager. Users say it’s outstanding and a must-have. It’ll allow you to do nearly everything and it takes things a step beyond normal e-book software. It’s also completely free and open source and great for both casual users and computer experts.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Calibre!

Calibre is a powerful and easy to use e-book manager. Users say it’s outstanding and a must-have. It’ll allow you to do nearly everything and it takes things a step beyond normal e-book software. It’s also completely free and open source and great for both casual users and computer experts.
